text: is a former Japanese football player. She played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Iwaya was born on June 1, 1964. In June 1981, when she was 17 years old, she was selected the Japan national team for 1981 AFC Championship. At this competition, on June 13, she debuted against Indonesia and Japan won this match (1-0). This is Japan team first victory. She played 2 games for Japan include this competition in 1981. ==Statistics== Japan Football Association Japan national team Year Apps Goals 1981 2 0 Total 2 0 ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese footballers Category:Shimizudaihachi Pleiades players Category:Japan women's international footballers Category:1981 AFC Women's Championship players
title: Mihoko Iwaya
